sentence: The resturant is currently under renovation so the dinning area has been relocated across the lobby into a large meeting room
Breakfast was lacking the bar was way too expensive and the bartender did not know there was a happy hour so I was overcharged
The hotel is in a nice area across from the mall and near good restaurants but they were not living up to their area
another reason i chose it was breakfast included and i was 100 percent sure that was the case when i confirmed the booking
They do not have complementary breakfast but they do have a restaurant that looked very good but I did not eat there
Ordered room service for breakfast but card never picked up
Breakfast were the same everyday during my four days of stay
A few minor problems included not having a small refrigerator in our room and we did ask right when we checked in but they said they were all gone and no free breakfast
However the bar and wait staff around the bar was extremely disappointing
NO free breakfast like we had at the Hampton last summer
We tried to eat at the restaurant but good luck getting any service
Local breakfast places are very good and we enjoyed the music in the bar but a 10 pm finish was just a little early
They had live music in the lounge during the evening and even during breakfast hours
This was my first time in Nashville if you like music bq big breakfasts whiskey sweet wine sports or any combination of them it is worth a visit
Called the hotel after we got done with dinner and everything was fine
Checking in online was nice as were the perks with being a Honors member especially the 2 free drinks per night at the bar although those were not replenished every night
A wide variety of restaurants across the street and within just a block or two
Oh we received many apologies and given restaurant vouchers by way of compensation but all we wanted was a clean room with everything we should have in it
Went there for dinner with friends

They definitely catered to those attending the music festival as they had drinks and snacks at all times in the LobyI missed having an outside pool during the hot days but other than this I would definitely stay there again

The valet staff very friendly Tyson sales manager was really great The restaurant in the hotel sucked the waiter was nice but waited 45 minutes for the toughest smallest dry ass over priced steak which I got cold the order was incomplete and in a box sucked after running 10 miles and hungry to get such a garbage meal
Bar Exam in Nashville
Within walking distance to a number of bars restaurants
Yes I have been to better hotels but I was most satisfied with the staff the amenities and the restaurant
The bar restaurant had very enjoyable live music every night with no cover charge
The only complaint I would have during my stay is the service and friendliness of the bar in the lobby
Restaurant staff friendly but food very expensive
I sat there my first breakfast out of four thinking to myself how this woman Mindy is creating an exceptional experience that outweighs the problems
Waking distance to river walk restaurants and entertainment
But we ordered the extra snack package and never got it
I will say that we ate at 2 very nice restaurants that we went there and got seated both times immediately without a wait and did not need a reservation
The lunch served through the catering at the hotel was great with good mix of vegetables meat and carbohydrates
My coworker and I were sitting in the restaurant we witnessed the manager Angel berate one of her servers in front of us
on site bar restaurant
I wish that they had free hot breakfast buffet there tho
Disappointed that breakfast was not included given the price of the room
The concierge and the breakfast wait staff totally rocked though
Did not dine there so can not provide info on that
He said that is when we get our food delivery maybe you should talk to the restaurant manager
Food was not good at restaurant
